title: Twitter post ideas Generator
original_prompt: Prepare a roster of 5 short and attention-grabbing Twitter post concepts that align with{Enter theme here: USC International Student Organization official account on twitter}. Propose interesting captions and appropriate hashtags to accompany each post.
split_prompt:
